mapper.update: update flight set flight_name = #{flightName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flight_from = #{flightFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flight_arr = #{flightArr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flight_ftime = #{flightFtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flight_atime = #{flightAtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where flight_id = #{flightId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select flight_id, flight_name, flight_from, flight_arr, flight_ftime, flight_atime from flight where flight_id = #{flightId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select flight_id, flight_name, flight_from, flight_arr, flight_ftime, flight_atime from flight

select flight_id, flight_name, flight_from, flight_arr, flight_ftime, flight_atime from flight where flight_from=#{flight_from,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flight_arr=#{flight_arr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flight_ftime like "%"#{flight_ftime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"

select flight_id, flight_name, flight_from, flight_arr, flight_ftime, flight_atime from flight where flight_from=#{flight_from,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flight_arr=#{flight_arr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flight_ftime like "%"#{flight_ftime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
